name: Mvc hotdog
body:
### My MVC project with CRUD
For this project I began using MVC.net with unit testing. I started with the model for the hot dog lover class with basic data fields as attributes. I then made sure the database connection in the webconfig file was correct. I then created a controller with views and entity framework. I then made sure the shared index layout had the correct link.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
